example.eg: We go to the same place for our holidays every year.
example.egtrans: 我们年年去同一个地方度假。

example.eg: Laurie still looks the same after all these years.
example.egtrans: 过了这么些年，劳丽还是老样子。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 同样的, 没有变化的

example.eg: The same man designed the Eiffel Tower and the armature for the Statue of Liberty.
example.egtrans: 埃菲尔铁塔和自由女神像的骨架的设计者是同一个人。

example.eg: She chose the same as I did.
A mother loves all her children the same.
example.egtrans: 母亲对所有孩子的爱都是相同的。

example.eg: Withholding the truth is the same as lying.
example.egtrans: 隐瞒事实与说谎是相同的性质。

example.eg: "I'm so tired I could fall asleep at my desk." "Same."
example.egtrans: “我好困，趴在桌子上都能睡着了。”“我也是。”

example.eg: The blouse that I wore was the same as my sister's.  Christmas dinner was the same as always: ham, potatoes, and salad.
example.egtrans: 我穿的衬衫与我姐妹的相同。
